pawithra 2012-07-15 11:22:37 mama shri jayawardhanayapura wishwawidyalaye igenuma labana sisuwiyak.ape kampas eke apith ekka igena ganna godak sisungen bahuthara pirisak bauddha swamin wahansela thamayi inne.api gihi pirimi sisungen nodakina thanpathbawak,hikmimak,sadacharayak ee pawidi sisun thula dakinawa.ee nisama thamayi yuwathiyan wana api nodanuwathwama hari wenath gihi pirimi sisunta sapekshakawa pawidi sisun samanga samipa sabandathawayan godananga ganna pelambaenne.mokada gihida pawidida kiyana eka neweyi methana gataluwa thiyenne.pudgalaya wiwaha jiwithayak gatha kirimata sandaha sudusuda kiyana ekayi.ethenadi mama dakinawa gihi pawidi washayen wargakirimak nokara thaman ekka sarthaka pawul jiwithayak gatha karanna wishwasadayaka pirimiyeku thoraganimedi gihi piriminta wada yuwathiyan wana api pawidi sisunta pramukhathwaya pirinamima samaja widyathmaka drushti konaya anuwa kisidu asadharana deyak nowe.ee nisa mama hithanawa meka hudek aagamika athin pamanak wigraha nokara samaja widyathmakawath me pilibandawa adahas dakwanna kiyala.ekedi apita gihi pawidi bhedayak wargikaranaya karala dakwanna amaruyi.mokada me prawruththiya anuwa ee bhikshunwahanse yuwathiyakwa nithyanukulawa wiwaha karaganima samaja widyathmaka drushti konya anuwa niwaradi deyak wana nisa.onna ee swamin wahanse yuwathiyawa nithyanukulawa wiwaha kara nogena ekata hitiya nam thamayi waradi.ape gihi aya nam ehema kasada nobanda ehemanam gahanu aya oya oona tharam kamarawalata ekka gihin thiya gena inne.ehema nam eewath waradiyine.meke adahas dakwala thiyena pirimi bahuthaya thaman waradi karana gaman anunge pol kenda loku karala pennanna mana balana kuhaka aya bawa mata nam pahadiliwa peni yanawa.mama nam kiyanne kawuru monawa kiwwath ape swamin wahansela harima silwath kiyalayi.
